notes: ICDM has a triple-blind submission policy since 2011, specifically disallowing pre-prints that are available online (such as on Arxiv). It also hides reveiwer names during discussion of the paper. A small number of papers will be invited to publish in expanded form in the KIS journal of Springer. Includes only regular papers. There were about 83 more short papers, also reviewed. ICDM has already been held in some 10 different countries, and the PC represent around 30 countries, with papers coming from 50 countries. 476 of the 778 submitted papers had a student first-author (note the 778 includes short papers, which aren't counted here). One of the questions reviewers are asked is whether they could replicate the results.
